name: FukuShima APIs
description: A collection of useful API endpoints

endpoints.name: Fukushima GPT
endpoints.desc: Send a prompt and get a response from Luminai AI
endpoints.creator: fukushima

params.prompt: Your question or command for the AI

endpoints.name: Pinterest Image Search
endpoints.desc: Search and retrieve a random image from Pinterest based on a keyword
endpoints.creator: fukushima

endpoints.name: Emoji Mix Image
endpoints.desc: Generate and retrieve a combined emoji image from two emoji characters
endpoints.creator: fukushima

params.emoji1: First emoji character (URL encoded if needed)
params.emoji2: Second emoji character (URL encoded if needed)

response.description: Returns a PNG image that is a mix of the two provided emojis

endpoints.name: YouTube MP3 Search
endpoints.desc: Search YouTube for videos and retrieve metadata (without download links) based on a keyword
endpoints.creator: fukushima

endpoints.name: YouTube MP3 Download
endpoints.desc: Download MP3 audio from YouTube video URL with available quality and metadata
endpoints.creator: fukushima

params.url: YouTube video URL to download MP3
